Method.name: ListTasksForUser
Method.Implementation: &sql(SELECT SqlQuery into :sql FROM %Dictionary.QueryDefinition WHERE Id='EnsLib.Workflow.Engine||ListTasksForCurrentUser') set sql =$Replace(sql,"Worklist","EnsLib_Workflow.Worklist") //because we need to add schema.
